content.rendered:
Hi-performance Progressives for Wider Near Zone

If you are looking for a wider field of view in intermediate and near in your daily work, Visiflex advanced progressive lenses are the ones; as they are specially designed to provide wider reading area and comfortable intermediate for dynamic performance.

Features



  • Specialised design for your daily activity
  • Wider reading zone and comfortable intermediate
  • Extra sharp vision and minimal distortion
  • Reduced unpleasant swim effect
  • Minimum oblique astigmatism
  • Improved performance suited for today’s digital environment
  • Enhanced vision comfort

Ratings




Ask for Yash O&L Authenticity Card for your lenses

Lens Design
